QuestData.Title: Enemies, Old and New
QuestData.Description: Our ancient enemy, the draenei, have returned with powerful allies. They wage war in Halaa, southwest of here.$B$BWe cannot allow them a victory there as Garadar would be next without a doubt.$B$BGo and slay those who would aid our ancient enemy.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat 10 enemy players in Halaa and return to Karrtog in Garadar.
QuestData.RewardText: You bring great honor to our people. You have our thanks.
